Issue.summary: Fabric-Network It's not clear from the documentation how to set event handling options such as commitTimeout
Issue.description: The reference documentation does exist here https://fabric-sdk-node.github.io/release-1.4/module-fabric-network.Gateway.html#~DefaultEventHandlerOptions__anchor but this isn't obvious or easy to find. It would be good if the tutorial that talks about how to wait for transactions to be committed provided a reference link to all the possible options and even provide an example of changing the timeout value.
